kDesc
A stocky armoured robotic-style suit. Bundle includes a helmet, top, bottom, gloves, and shoes. [#Legal]
Une solide armure robotique. L'ensemble comprend un casque, un haut, un bas, des gants et des chaussures. [#Legal]
Ein Kampfanzug im Roboter-Stil. Das Set beinhaltet Helm, Oberteil, Unterteil, Handschuhe und Stiefel. [#Legal]
Robusta tuta corazzata in stile robotico. Il pacchetto include casco, corazza, pantaloni, guanti e scarpe. [#Legal]
Un traje robusto y blindado de estilo robótico. El conjunto comprende casco, parte superior, parte inferior, guantes y calzado. [#Legal]
로봇 스타일의 단단한 중장갑입니다. 이 세트는 헬멧, 상의, 하의, 장갑, 그리고 신발을 포함합니다. [#Legal]
A stocky armored robotic-style suit. Bundle includes a helmet, top, bottom, gloves, and shoes. [#Legal]
矮壯的裝甲機械人風格服裝。本服裝組包括頭盔、上身、下身、手套及鞋。[#Legal]
矮壯的裝甲機械人風格服裝。本服裝組包括頭盔、上半身、下半身、手套及鞋。[#Legal]
A stocky armored robotic-style suit. Bundle includes a helmet, top, bottom, gloves, and shoes. [#Legal]
